name: Melon Pink Fizz Punch

ingredients.name: bottle pink Champagne
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or your choice of non-alcoholic sparkling.

preparation: Cube the whole watermelon, and puree half in a blender or food processor, add 1 cup of juice, and puree, until all liquid.
Transfer to a serving jug, or punch bowl, and add tea, the water melon, and the champagne. Combine gently, and pour over ice into glasses.

products.name: Pink Lemonade Herbal Tea Blend
summary: A versatile sipper reminiscent of old-time lemonade and packed with thirst-busting citrusy flavor!
